mapper.select: select ifnull(count(distinct b.create_by), 0) as secondStay, ifnull(count(distinct c.create_by), 0) as three, ifnull(count(distinct d.create_by), 0) as sevenStay, ifnull(count(distinct e.create_by), 0) as fifteenStay, ifnull(count(distinct f.create_by), 0) as monthStay, ifnull(count(distinct b.create_by) / (select count(0) from sys_user where create_date between #{request.secondBegin} and #{request.secondEnd}), 0) as secondPer, ifnull(count(distinct c.create_by) / (select count(0) from sys_user where create_date between #{request.treeBegin} and #{request.treeEnd}), 0) as threePer, ifnull(count(distinct d.create_by) / (select count(0) from sys_user where create_date between #{request.serverBegin} and #{request.serverEnd}), 0) as sevenStayPer, ifnull(count(distinct e.create_by) / (select count(0) from sys_user where create_date between #{request.fifteenBegin} and #{request.fifteenEnd}), 0) as fifteenStayPer, ifnull(count(distinct f.create_by) / (select count(0) from sys_user where create_date between #{request.mothBegin} and #{request.mothEnd}), 0) as monthStayPer from sys_login_detail a left join (select create_by from sys_login_detail where datediff(#{request.beginDate}, #{request.second}) = 1 group by create_by) b on a.create_by = b.create_by left join (select create_by from sys_login_detail where datediff(#{request.beginDate}, #{request.tree}) = 3 group by create_by) c on a.create_by = b.create_by left join (select create_by from sys_login_detail where datediff(#{request.beginDate}, #{request.server}) = 7 group by create_by) d on a.create_by = b.create_by left join (select create_by from sys_login_detail where datediff(#{request.beginDate}, #{request.fifteen}) = 15 group by create_by) e on a.create_by = b.create_by left join (select create_by from sys_login_detail where datediff(#{request.beginDate}, #{request.moth}) = 30 group by create_by) f on a.create_by = b.create_by
